154112.content: Lockette flew through the tunnel, she felt her tiny pixie body wash over with a subtle warmth, she let it embrace her as she watched all the crystals around the tunnel glow their respective colours, she was bewildered by their splendor, not noticing that her body was growing, muscles developing as well as endowments, she reached 10 feet tall and her body was now more fairy like, but carrying on through the tunnel that became less and less the case as her breasts grew huge, much like her muscles and when she came out the other end of the tunnel, completely oblivious, she didnt even realise taht she had grown, until she looked down, gasping at her own hugeness until she ran her hands over her body and suddenly began to enjoy it a little more.

info.brief_description: The Winx Club girls grow into hulking giantesses.
info.description:
This story is about the girls from Winx Club growing huge and muscular. I do not own Winx Club and make no profit off of this story.

Rules:
-Make the girls as tall and muscular as you wish
-No descriptions of blood or gore
-No swearing
-Keep the girls in-character
-Nothing sexual involving the pixies or other underage girls
-The Winx girls and other good girls are gentle, but they may use their size to toy with their boyfriends or otherwise use it to their advantage
-Other than that, go nuts
